benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/bundles/{bundleId}/block - Block a bundle

covered: Missing or malformed body handling (TC10, TC08)
NotFound and general error cases (TC05, TC07, TC17, TC28)
Optional headers and query parameters coverage (TC02, TC03, TC04, TC12)
Security - injection and XSS handling (TC19, TC20)
gaps: No test for duplicate submission / idempotency (missing TC for duplicates)
No explicit 500 Internal Server Error scenario (DB/service failure)
No caching headers tests for POST (ETag/Cache-Control)
recommendations: Add a dedicated test for duplicate submission / idempotency to ensure safe replays
Introduce a 500 Internal Server Error scenario (simulate DB/service failure) to validate server error handling
Add rate-limiting/throttling tests to verify behavior under rapid requests
Add tests to verify caching headers or explicitly confirm absence of caching on POST
Consider consolidating tests to explicitly cover 400/422 scenarios for invalid field types and values
